mapper.select: SELECT e.ENT_NM, MBER_IDX,e.ENT_IDX,INTRVW_DFFLY,INTRVW_YM,INTRVW_ROUTE,INTRVW_REVW,INTRVW_QESTN,INTRVW_ANSWER,INTRVW_FL,INTRVW_RESULT,INTRVW_EXPRNC,PRESNATN_DT,REG_DT FROM INTERVIEW_TB i LEFT JOIN ENTERPRISE_TB e ON i.ENT_IDX = e.ENT_IDX WHERE i.ENT_IDX=#{ENT_IDX} AND i.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} AND i.INTRVW_FL=#{INTRVW_FL}

SELECT ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, itv.MBER_IDX, itv.INTRVW_DFFLY, itv.INTRVW_RESULT, itv.REG_DT FROM INTERVIEW_TB itv LEFT JOIN ENTERPRISE_TB ent ON itv.ENT_IDX = ent.ENT_IDX WHERE itv.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} AND INTRVW_FL=#{INTRVW_FL} ORDER BY itv.INTRVW_IDX desc
SELECT INTRVW_DFFLY, count(INTRVW_DFFLY) as count FROM INTERVIEW_TB WHERE ENT_IDX=#{ENT_IDX} AND INTRVW_FL=#{INTRVW_FL} GROUP BY INTRVW_DFFLY ORDER BY INTRVW_DFFLY
